results.content: This course was OK. The lessons in this course were more of a show-and-tell and lacked a relevant application of skills. Also, there were basic things like inconsistent tabbing in .js files that I thought could teach beginners bad habits. I have other courses by Lawrence and have enjoyed; this one was just a "miss" for me.
